short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for exploring active stargates for stargate-game.cz

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension only purpose is to share state of player assets in game stargate-game.cz. Thanks to this shared state, the users does not have to search long minutes for planets which belongs to their teammates in game map, but they will click extension which will lookup the remote db and serves back redirect url of what they are looking for. For extension to be operational, it has to be installed at least by 2 players.

Extension saves time of its users, and does not store any personal or financial information - just game assets state of individual players and purges data every two months.
